title: MiLB.com Logo
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the MiLB.com/video page
custom_steps: WHEN the user looks at the heading of the page
custom_expected: THEN the user should see the MiLB.com logo in the top left of the heading

title: Carousel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the NEW VPP
https://beta-aws.milb.com/video
custom_steps: WHEN the page finishes loading
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a single "Game Highlights" carousel under the Jumbotron player with "active marker" on current asset 
AND play control on subsequent video that will play next
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19343)

title: Autoplay
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has loaded the VPP
custom_steps:
WHEN the page finishes loading 
AND the loading spinner disappears
custom_expected: THEN the video player will start autoplaying

title: Preroll
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the VPP
custom_steps: WHEN autoplay begins
custom_expected:
THEN start a preroll ad
AND preroll conclusion will transition into asset playback

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19325)

title: Playlist Progress
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the VPP
AND the user is on a playlist
custom_steps: WHEN one asset ends
custom_expected:
THEN shift positioning the "Active" marker (gray bar) on the next asset 
AND start playing the next asset

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/19327)

title: Playlist Arrows & Progress
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on a VPP
AND playlist content is available under the player
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the left/right arrow
custom_expected: THEN the playlist will shift based on the browser's viewport, ex if <5 assets are visible, then shift <5 assets over. if 5 assets are visible, then shift 3 assets over.

title: Metadata Updates
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the VPP
AND metadata has loaded on the player
custom_steps: WHEN one asset concludes and another begins playing
custom_expected: THEN update the metadata to reflect the newly playing asset

title: Social Sharing/Media
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the VPP
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to share an asset
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the following social media icons: Facebook, Twitter, Email, Link, iframe and not G+, Link, Embed.
AND the user will get the following behavior
- Facebook: Opens new window, asking user to post the video link and metadata
- Twitter: Opens new window, asking user to post the link
- Email: Opens a blank tab then email application with the title and a link to the video
- Embed Link: https://beta-aws.milb.com/video/best-gonzos-of-2017/c-1865437083?tid=18601616
- iframe Link: <iframe src=https://beta-aws.milb.com/video/best-gonzos-of-2017/c-1865437083?tid=18601616</iframe>

Known issues on devices: (iOS) https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/BMP-729

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19328)

title: Search and Tags return results
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the VPP
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a keyword search
OR WHEN the user clicks a tag
custom_expected: THEN the user should be brought search results in either case

title: Megamenu Dropdown**
custom_preconds:
This is based on the AC https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/BMP-103

1- If there is a dropdown set up in Homebase, then the VPP page for that Club or league should show the dropdown with any corresponding nested menus. (You can use club t537 - Hudson valley Renegades to test this)

2- This drop down should NOT appear at all if the club/league/MiLB does not have a menu set up in Homebase to populate the megamenu. It should NOT default to MILB.com's cms file, but rather, it should show no megamenu.

3- The topics in the Nav should link to their corresponding URL

title: Back to Beginning
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a playing video
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on Start from beginning button
custom_expected:
THEN the video should restart from the beginning

custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a playing video
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on Play/Pause button
custom_expected:

custom_expected:

title: Timecode Progresses with Video
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a playing video
custom_steps: WHEN the video progresses
custom_expected:
THEN the currentTimecode value should slowly approach the endTimecode value in the player
AND when it currentTimecode=endTimecode
THEN return to leave-behind or preview poster

custom_expected:
THEN the volume control displays

custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a playing video
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on the volume button
custom_expected:
THEN the user is able to mute/unmute the volume of the video

NOTE: Mute displays a red "x" next to the speaker icon AND Unmute displays blue wave bars.

custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a playing video
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on the fullscreen button
custom_expected: THEN the user is taken to the fullscreen video experience

title: Fullscreen Controls
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has loaded a player
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters fullscreen
AND interacts with player controls
custom_expected:
THEN all controls should work as expected
AND will display "Press "esc" to exit full screen" option (User can click on "esc" button to exit full screen)

* Note that any mobile/tablet devices will use the device's native player controls. Any controls displayed are the expected ones.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19338)

title: X to Close | Return to Preview Poster **
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on any video with an X button
- Homepage Mixed feed: https://www.mlb.com
- Club Mixed feed: https://www.mlb.com/orioles
- Scores: https://www.mlb.com/scores
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks X
custom_expected:
THEN the video should ALWAYS return to the preview poster associated with the video watched
- NOTE it is known that android cannot close this X
- https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WMI-1973
- https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WMI-1954

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13203)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13204)

title: Adblocker | Adblock Plus blocks ads and plays media
custom_preconds: GIVEN the users have adblock enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on a section with playable media
- Video page: https://beta-aws.milb.com/video/
custom_expected:
THEN the user should not see any preroll ads
AND assets play without issue
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19339)

title: Player controls are unavailable/hidden during pre-roll ad
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is watching a preroll advertisement
custom_steps: WHEN the user hovers the player (web) or click+holds on it (mobile/tablet)
custom_expected:
THEN no controls should appear on the player, user only have access to volume control (mute/unmute)
AND when preroll ends all controls should appear
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19340)

title: Preroll | Conclusion returns to Asset as expected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is watching a video
AND preroll has preceded the video
custom_steps: WHEN preroll ends
custom_expected:
THEN the asset should follow shortly after
AND at no point should the player get stuck looking black or empty

title: Preroll | Autoplay muted/Nonautoplay unmuted **
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is https://beta-aws.milb.com/video
AND the user does not have adblock enabled
custom_steps: WHEN a video is playing
custom_expected:
THEN video should be unmuted by default for non-autoplay media (due to user interaction with the player)
AND video should be muted by default for autoplay media (due to user interaction with the player)

Known issue: Autoplay videos are muted by default on mobile/web, but mobile can't play audio unless the user again clicks the video once. Simply clicking fullscreen, the audio will look on but will be 100% stuck muted until you exit fullscreen, then tap the video once. There is a separate case for this

title: Preroll | Clicking a playlist asset won't start another preroll
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the VPP
AND preroll is already playing
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects a new asset from the currently playing VPP
custom_expected:
THEN continue the currently running Ad
AND follow up with the asset
AND DON'T play another preroll asset

custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has adblock disabled
AND the user plays an asset on the site
- Video page: https://beta-aws.milb.com/video/
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks a preroll ad
custom_expected:
THEN the asset should redirect to a link in a new tab related to that commercial

Ex: RBI Baseball

custom_steps:

title: Video Tags return related Tag results
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the VPP watching content
https://beta-aws.milb.com/video/express-top-10-plays-5/c-1868535583
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks a tag
Ex: Pacific Coast

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19345)
custom_expected:
THEN the tag link will return related search results for that tag
Ex: https://beta-aws.milb.com/video/search/tag/pacific_coast

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19346)

title: Search again from a Tag URL
custom_preconds:
Related Jira: https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WMI-2607

GIVEN the user is on a search tag URL
Ex: https://beta-aws.milb.com/video/search/tag/pacific_coast
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters a keyword search on the page link above
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see search results related to that keyword
AND the user should NOT see search results related to that tag from the URL

title: Search Results | Scrolling to the bottom loads 20 more results
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on a search page of the VPP
Tag Ex: https://beta-aws.milb.com/video/search/tag/pacific_coast
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls down to the bottom of the first 20 results
custom_expected:
THEN 20 more results will load in
AND then scrolling down will trigger another 20 results
AND the "results found" counter at the top-left of the page should update appropriately

title: Search returns related search results
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the VPP
AND the user enters a keyword search
Ex: https://beta-aws.mlb.com/video/search?q=dinger
custom_steps: WHEN a search is returned
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the following:
"Search Video" in the search control (right side)
"Search results for: dinger" under the heading (left side)
"20 of x results found" under the heading (left side)

AND clicking a result will play that media


![](index.php?/attachments/get/19347)

title: Search Results | Return TopicID where necessary **
custom_preconds:
Related Jira: https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WMI-2555

GIVEN a user enters a search result
AND that result brings VTP and non-VTP related results
Ex: https://beta-aws.milb.com/video/search?q=dinger
custom_steps: WHEN the user copies the link of the results
custom_expected:
1. IF the asset is related to a VTP
THEN the user will see ?tid=vtp_some_name_like_this
AND ?q= will be removed
Ex: Look for "HRD Rd2: Sanchez slugs 485-foot homer in Round 2"
Result: https://beta-aws.mlb.com/video/c-1597904483?tid=vtp_hrd_sponsor
![](index.php?/attachments/get/17170)

2. IF the asset isn't related to a VTP
THEN the user will not see ?tid= added, just ?q=
Ex: Look for "NYM@STL: Voit goes opposite-field for a solo home run"
Result: https://beta-aws.mlb.com/video/c-1593618683?q=dinger
![](index.php?/attachments/get/17171)


Some VTP parameter examples below
?tid=vtp_hrd_sponsor > 2017 T-Mobile Home Run Derby (topicID=187525564)
?tid=vtp_club_top_play > Indians Top Plays (topicID=220572662)
?tid=vtp_transactions > On The Move (topicID=33965510)
?tid=vtp_top_performer > #ASGWorthy (topicID=155065792)
?tid=vtp_power > Papa Slams (topicID=82574482)

title: "Search Video" ghost text disappear as user starts to enter text in the search field.
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the VPP
custom_steps: WHEN user click on the search field and starts to type in any word
custom_expected:
THEN the ghost text "search videos" disappears
AND when the entry is erased, the ghost text reappears

title: MiLB Portal Styling
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to www.milb.com
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the video player page
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the MiLB Portal page styling

title: League Portal Styling
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to www.milb.com
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the video player page
AND the user adds the league designation into the url: https://www.milb.com/{League Designation}/video/{Name of Video}/c-{Content ID}?tid={Topic ID}
i.e: https://www.milb.com/international/video/carrolls-diving-catch/c-2524448883?tid=263548762

a list of league designations are located at: https://prod-aws.milbstatic.com/configs/clubs.json
custom_expected: THEN users will see the styling of the league the user selects

title: Team Portal Styling
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to www.milb.com
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the video player page
AND the user adds the teams location designation into the url: https://www.milb.com/{Team Location Designation}/video/{Name of Video}/c-{Content ID}?tid={Topic ID}
i.e: https://www.milb.com/durham/video/carrolls-diving-catch/c-2524448883?tid=263548762

a list of league designations are located at: https://prod-aws.milbstatic.com/configs/clubs.json
custom_expected: THEN users would see the team styling of their choice.
